title: Desert Journeys Music Cinematic PRO
description: An exotic, oriental soundtrack sprinkled with rare instruments to give an adventurous yet mysterious vibe.
longDescription:
Click here to listen to the album preview


"Somewhere amongst the scorching dunes lies a deep mystery..." could be a fair starting description of this album. Full of thick orchestral themes combined with exotic instruments such as duduk, oud, bouzouki and exotic percussion typical of the Far Orient, the album is heavily focused on action-adventure genres with a dash of riddles and hidden secrets.


12 cinematic tracks spanning 27 minutes of original music, ranging from luxurious, triumphant tones to dark, mystery-driven themes.


Since the nature of the material is a mix of themes/melodies and some loops, this is excellent for cutscene/cinematic content, menu music, credit rolls, and to some extent in-game background music.


Award-winning composer for video games and films, Lex is a game lover to the core, and his wish is to fuse them with his love for music, therefore if you desire to collaborate or have any inquiries/custom requests, don't hesitate to contact at resonantinfinity@gmail.com, or browse his profile for more awesome music.


A toast to creativity!
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  AAA quality, professionally mixed and mastered tracks
  •  Exotic instruments used throughout
  •  Oriental-driven album themes

Number of Audio Wavs: 12

Number of Audio Cues: 12

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Some

Minutes of audio provided: 27

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
